title: BrandMyMail
description:
BrandMyMail is a product of Inovisoft LLC, a Delaware-based company founded in 2011 and operating out of Funchal, Portugal.
Inovisoft aims to participate in the social web revolution, to move email into the next generation, and to allow people to do cool things. Our user's privacy is extremely important to us, and we do everything we can to make sure it is never compromised.
